name: The Scent of Home
description:
Do you remember the scent of your home?

At the end of the street there is a small shop with candles that bring back memories. Dive into the world of delicate scents and try to remember... or forget.

"The Scent of Home" is my first text-based game. It's short but has multiple endings. It's inspired by various creations from magical realism genre.
